entry.content: Welcome to my new blog! I finally transitioned my old static website to a better one using Jekyll. I will mainly blog about science I find interesting at the intersection of AI, neuroscience ðŸ§ , physics and neuromorphic computing ðŸ¤–. Stay tuned!
